name: here-and-there
description: Capstone Project for Ada Developers Academy C8

scripts.install: (cd here-and-there && npm install) && (cd server && npm install)
scripts.start: concurrently "cd here-and-there && PORT=3000 npm start" "cd server && PORT=3001 npm start"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd here-and-there && npm build" "cd server && npm build"
